writer.name: 曼努埃尔·穆尼奥斯·里瓦斯 Manuel Muñoz Rivas

director.name: 曼努埃尔·穆尼奥斯·里瓦斯 Manuel Muñoz Rivas

introduction: A group of passengers cross a river on a small ferry. Fog, laughter, whispers and faces inhabit a floating, suspended space. Time passes, the shore is now closer and people prepare for another part of their journey. Aqueronte summons the essence of cinema to transport us to unreal spaces where life is crystallised in a changing landscape of light and shadow. In this cinematic trip, Manuel Muñoz Rivas reaffirms the fabulating power of moving images.源自：https://iffr.com/en/iffr/2023/films/aqueronte
